thread.title: Thinking of touring Canada? Lana is your expert
thread.title_full: Thinking of touring Canada? Lana is your expert

title: Thinking of touring Canada? Lana is your expert
text:
Thinking of touring Canada? Lana is your expert 20th Jul 2015 12:00 AM Lana Taylor: "The best part about Canada is the people." Photo: Flight Centre Related Items Local Real Estate Cars For Sale 
For Canadian Lana Taylor, a chance meeting with her future husband in Copenhagen brought them back to his home in the Darling Downs. 
She now manages the Flight Centre Toowoomba store and finds nothing more satisfying than spruiking the marvels in her native land and creating memorable moments for her customers. 
"The best part about Canada is the people - they are some of the friendliest folks around. Not to mention, the country has so much natural beauty. 
"A trip to Canada is one you'll look back on for years to come, whether you're on the Peak to Peak Glass Bottom Gondola in Whistler, in a kayak paddling through the piercing blue waters of Lake Louise, spotting moose in Jasper National Park or showered with mist at the thundering Niagara Falls. 
"With natural wonders, amazing cities, incredible culture and food, Canada really does have something to offer all ages and it's a wonderful, easy place to travel. What more could you ask for?" 
Lana also has plenty to be excited 'aboot' with the upcoming Discover the Americas Travel Expo. 
"Airlines always release some great airfares during this time. I generally always purchase my flights back home to Canada during this expo. Ensure you make an appointment with your local travel consultant so you get access to the best deals to discover Canada for yourself!" 
Discover the Americas Travel Expo exclusive deals will be available in store at your local Flight Centre on Saturday 25 and Sunday 26 July. 
Call Flight Centre for your next holiday on 1300 499 787. canada
